alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Dickson; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery; Robertson; Stewart (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 13 at 8:41AM CDT until October 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Dry and Windy Conditions this Afternoon... .A Red Flag Warning is now in effect for several counties, basically north of I-40 and west of I-65. RH values will fall into the low 20s and winds will gust 25-30 mph this afternoon. Yes, this area saw rainfall, but it was very little and likely did nothing to curb the dry conditions already in place.. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 005, 006, 007, 023, 024, 025, AND 026... The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 005 Stewart, 006 Montgomery, 007 Robertson, 023 Houston, 024 Humphreys, 025 Dickson and 026 Cheatham. * WINDS...West 5 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Cheatham; Dickson; Houston; Humphreys; Montgomery; Robertson; Stewart
